column4: U.S. consumer spending gauge rises  but confidence weakens
column5: WASHINGTON A gauge of U.S. consumer spending rose in September as Americans likely snapped up Apple's new iPhone and bought leisure goods  but falling car sales pointed to sluggish economic growth.

column4: Western Union profit falls as expenses rise; shares down 13 percent
column5: Western Union Co   the world's largest money-transfer company  reported a 20 percent fall in quarterly profit in the face of increasing competition and higher regulatory expenses  sending its shares down 13 percent after the bell.

column4: Western Union profit falls as consumer business weakens
column5: Oct 29 Western Union Co  the world's largest money-transfer company  reported a 20 percent fall in third-quarter profit  hurt by lower revenue from its consumer business and higher expenses.

column4: UPDATE 1-BP's Whiting refinery ramp-up timetable slips into 2014
column5: LONDON  Oct 29 BP Plc said on Tuesday that its upgraded 405 000 barrel per day (bpd) Whiting refinery in Indiana will not reach full production until the first quarter of 2014  an apparent slippage in the ramp-up timetable.

column4: Yamana Gold's profit drops  could miss 2013 output target
column5: Yamana Gold Inc  reported a 28 percent fall in third-quarter profit on Tuesday due to weaker metals prices and lower earnings from the company's stake in the Alumbrera mine in Argentina.

column4: UPDATE 2-Yamana Gold's profit drops  could miss 2013 output target
column5: Oct 29 Yamana Gold Inc reported a 28 percent fall in third-quarter profit on Tuesday due to weaker metals prices and lower earnings from the company's stake in the Alumbrera mine in Argentina.

column4: Yamana third-quarter profit drops on lower metal prices
column5: Oct 29 Yamana Gold Inc reported a 28 percent decline in third-quarter profit on Tuesday  due to lower realized commodity prices and lower earnings from the company's stake in the Alumbrera mine in Argentina.

column4: Yelp's quarterly loss widens
column5: Yelp Inc   operator of a consumer reviews website  reported a wider quarterly loss as it spent more on marketing.
